name: accuRx
slogan: Bringing patients and healthcare teams together, when anyone in a GP practice to text a patient
description:
AccuRx’s mission is to be the communications platform that brings patients and their healthcare teams together; helping make patients healthier and caregivers happier.

Currently, we let GP practices communicate with their patients, team and other organisations. We’ve grown from being used in a handful of organisations at the beginning of 2018, to now being in over 1 in 3 practices that send over 50000 messages a day to patients – improving care and saving staff over half an hour each day.

Over the next 12 months we’re growing our practice base in the UK and rolling out exciting new products to enable the future of primary care.

jobs.title: Software Engineer
jobs.description:
## **At accuRx, we're on a mission to change lives by bringing patients and their healthcare teams together.**

### **Who are accuRx?**

At accuRx, we're building a world-famous healthcare communication platform. Our mission is simple - to change lives by bringing patients and their healthcare teams together. Our technology is revolutionising how technology is adopted and how care is delivered in healthcare.

Established in 2016 and now with £9m in Series A funding, accuRx is one of the UK's fastest-growing tech start ups. In one year, we grew from only a few GP practices using us to over 20% of the market. Today, over 40% of GP practices rely on us, we've just gone live in pharmacies and will soon be used in hospitals. Our vision is that anyone involved in a patient's care can communicate with each other.

We're on an incredible journey at accuRx with big ambitions, problems to solve and lives to change!

###  

### **Life as a Software Engineer at accuRx**

Every day at accuRx as a Software Engineer, you will be solving real world problems and building a product that is going to impact every single person in the UK.

As a Software Engineer, you'll join a small team of incredibly talented men and women who care about what they are building and why. Together you'll be inspired by how you can fix a world-wide problem in technology. You will single-handedly change people's lives from what you are creating.

We don't mind what languages or frameworks you've used before (in fact, different experiences bring different perspectives to the table, we are always keen to hear other peoples views) - just that you're willing to break things, fix things, learn fast and carry on creating!

To best service healthcare practices and build a scalable solution that will be used in every GP surgery in the UK, we currently work with C# .NET Core, SQL, React, ES6 and Redux. However, we are constantly learning, iterating and improving. As we continue to grow at a phenomenal rate, who knows what tech stack we will be working with soon - and you could be the person to show us!

### **We'd really like to hear from you, if ...**

- You have 2+ years of experience in software engineering.
- The healthcare industry is something you're passionate about or you already have industry experience in it.
- You're mission-driven and care about creating something amazing that will impact the lives of millions.
- Change excites you - you want to play a part in our incredible growth journey, have a voice and help us transform the healthcare industry like never before!
- Problem-solving is what you live for - you relish in the constant obstacles a start up throws your way.
- You're an excellent communicator with the ability to translate complex to simple, bringing your ideas to life.
- You share our values and we can depend on you to proactively inspire others to be dependable and committed Engineers

 

### **Perks of the job at accuRx**

People are what drives us.

Our users are the reason we created our product and inspire us every day to be better.

However, we would not have achieved so much so soon without our own incredible team. In order to continue changing the lives of healthcare practitioners and patients nationwide, we are looking for more fantastic talent to join us!

Here are just some of the reasons why accuRx is an awesome place to work:

- Meaningful **share options** , so that you own a part of the company and get rewarded for all of your hard work.
- Lots of our team have small families or are first-time mums/dad's. We understand how beneficial **flexible working hours** can be and so have core working hours of 10am-4pm. When you arrive and leave is totally up to you just as long as you are productive and get the work done :)
- **Free breakfast daily** and constant supply of fruit, snacks and drinks in the office.
- **Free healthy pescatarian and veggie lunch every day.**
- **Monthly team dinners,** we like to alternate cooking in the office and heading out to local restaurants. We love to take full advantage 1 of our Founders (Jacob) culinary skills, he's been on MasterChef after all! - so far we've made our own sushi, pizza and pasta!
- **Spill -** All employees have the option to use this **Mental Health platform**. It's completely confidential and can be used however best suits your needs, each employee gets up to 6 sessions with a qualified therapist per year. If you simply have a question but don't require a session there is a platform for this as well! 
- Office yoga, park runs & gym classes.
- Annual week-long Summer Retreat - no expense spared - with partners invited for the weekend. This year we are heading to **West Lexham!**
- £500 annual wellness bonus - to support both physical and mental health.
- Cycle to work scheme.
- 28 days holiday (plus bank holidays).
- Beautiful, brand new office in Haggerston near Shoreditch, equipped with the latest tech and (of course) ping pong table.
- Pension scheme

We're building a business and culture to be proud of - see our [Employee Handbook](https://www.notion.so/accurx/Employee-Handbook-f9743d59eeb04a6a8430af2cd51f3d16) in full here. 

Specifically check out the [Engineering at accuRx](https://www.notion.so/accurx/Engineering-at-accuRx-313cf3e2ff9a408bb9ceea6ba84b3b66) section. 

Check us out on [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/accurxteam) to see what life at accuRx is really like!

 

### **Why is a diverse and inclusive workplace so important to us?**

Each health system is made up of a diverse workforce, serving 100% of the population. We are building for them, not us. We can only transform health systems if we build a diverse team, rich with different backgrounds, opinions and personalities. We are an equal opportunities employer and a pleasant and supportive place to work. We particularly welcome applications from those who are significantly underrepresented in the technology sector, such as women, people with disabilities and individuals from Black and Minority ethnic communities.

jobs.title: Senior Front End Engineer
jobs.description:
## **At accuRx, we're on a mission to change lives by bringing patients and their healthcare teams together.**

At accuRx, we're building a world-famous healthcare communication platform. Our mission is simple - to change lives by bringing patients and their healthcare teams together. Our technology is revolutionising how technology is adopted and how care is delivered in healthcare.

Established in 2016 and now with £9m in Series A funding, accuRx is one of the UK's fastest-growing tech start ups. In one year, we grew from only a few GP practices using us to over 20% of the market. Today, over 70% of GP practices rely on us, we've just gone live in pharmacies and hospitals. Our vision is that anyone involved in a patient's care can communicate with each other.

In the past 18 months accuRx has grown from being used by 20 GP practices to 5500+, with over 90,000+ users every day. And we certainly won't be slowing down any time soon.

In response to the COVID-19 crisis, in the last few weeks, we've been working tirelessly to release multiple features that directly help clinicians deal with the outbreak - this has included a Virtual Consultation platform for both GP and Hospital settings.

This has meant some late hours and even weekend work but the feedback we have received has been truly amazing! We are exceptionally proud of our NHS and all the work they do, this is our way of saying thank you.

### **Life as a Senior Front End Engineer at accuRx**

We are looking for a Senior Front End Engineer to join us and help shape the future of our product.

Working closely with our CTO and VP Engineering, you will pioneer front end development and be relied upon as one of our greatest technical experts. As a Senior Front End Engineer, you’ll scale and innovate our product like never before, as well as have the opportunity to build brand new solutions.

As a Senior Front End Engineer, you’ll be part of an incredibly talented team of men and women, all motivated by the same mission: to change lives by fixing the world-wide problem that is communication in healthcare.

At accuRx, we are about to embark on the next part of our journey. We are looking for the most inspirational and talented people to lead the way and make history in one of the UK’s fastest-growing start-ups.

### **We'd really like to hear from you, if ...**

- You have over 5 years proven experience in a Senior Front End Development & Engineering
- You’re a front end expert, ideally in React.
- You have solid experience in Javascript, having TypeScript & Bootstrap experience would be an added bonus!
- You have experience of building a User Centric product over time and have the ability to continually iterate your code to improve the functionality of the product 
- The healthcare industry is something you are passionate about or you already have experience in it.
- You're mission-driven and care about creating something amazing that will impact the lives of millions.
- Problem-solving is what you live for - building something that will fix a world-wide problem is what gets you out of bed every day!
- Change and fast pace excites you - you relish in the constant obstacles a start up throws your way.
- You share our values (read more about them in our [Culture Deck](https://www.slideshare.net/LaurenceBargery/accurx-culture-deck))

 

We're building a business and culture to be proud of - see our [Employee Handbook](https://www.notion.so/accurx/Employee-Handbook-f9743d59eeb04a6a8430af2cd51f3d16) in full here.

Check us out on [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/accurxteam) to see what life at accuRx is really like!

jobs.title: Product Designer
jobs.description:
## **At accuRx, we're on a mission to change lives by bringing patients and their healthcare teams together.**

### **Who are accuRx?**

At accuRx, we're building a world-famous healthcare communication platform. Our mission is simple - to change lives by bringing patients and their healthcare teams together. Our technology is revolutionising how technology is adopted and how care is delivered in healthcare.

Established in 2016 and now with £9m in Series A funding, accuRx is one of the UK's fastest-growing tech start ups. In one year, we grew from only a few GP practices using us to over 20% of the market. Today, over 70% of GP practices rely on us, we've just gone live in pharmacies and hospitals. Our vision is that anyone involved in a patient's care can communicate with each other.

In the past 18 months accuRx has grown from being used by 20 GP practices to 5500+, with over 90,000+ users every day. And we certainly won't be slowing down any time soon.

In response to the COVID-19 crisis, in the last few weeks, we've been working tirelessly to release multiple features that directly help clinicians deal with the outbreak - this has included a Virtual Consultation platform for both GP and Hospital settings.

This has meant some late hours and even weekend work but the feedback we have received has been truly amazing! We are exceptionally proud of our NHS and all the work they do, this is our way of saying thank you.

### **Life as a Product Designer at accuRx**

We are looking for a well-rounded Product Designer to help us shape the future of communication in healthcare.

Working closely with our Lead Product Designer and the wider Product team, you will contribute across a broad spectrum of impactful projects from day one. As one of the first few Product Designers in to the business you'll have a huge part to play in shaping what we build.

As a Product Designer at accuRx you will give life to ideas by:

- Researching with users and intimately understanding their needs
- Testing with prototypes that can be easily disposed of or iterated on to learn more
- Refining through high fidelity mock-ups that solve the problem at hand
- Delivering through embedding yourself in the delivery of work

On top of that you'll work with a team of cross-functional team-mates to achieve a common vision. We value collaboration above all else, so sharing work early and often is vital. We see feedback as one of our greatest tools for refining and shaping ideas. That means Product Designers at accuRx need to feel just as comfortable letting go of solutions, as they do championing them.

At accuRx, we are about to embark on the next part of our journey and we are looking for inspirational and talented people to help lead the way.

### **We'd really like to hear from you, if...**

- You have over 2 years proven experience in a Product Design role
- You have demonstrable product design skills, such as:
  - A backlog of user research tactics to help shape the problem
  - A knack for effective prototyping – opting for the best tool for the job
  - A strong base of visual design skills – well-grounded in the fundamentals
  - A value for exceptional craft in user interface design, and the desire to achieve it
  - A systems view of the world, and the need to simplify complex interactions
  - A natural communication style with a proficiency in clear and concise writing
- You have experience contributing to a design system
- You have experience designing complex products for a diverse group of users
- You follow user-centric design methodologies and put research at the heart of your solutions
- You like to embrace the small details that ultimately define the product
- You are passionate about or you already have experience in the healthcare industry
- You are mission-driven and care about creating something amazing that will impact the lives of millions
- You are excited by change and a fast paced learning environment
- You share our values – and want to add to them! (read more about them in our [Culture Deck](https://www.slideshare.net/LaurenceBargery/accurx-culture-deck))
